segments.text: I'm really worried about that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out, and it looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, trying to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is just standing there, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don't seem to realize the danger they are in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is already wet from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That just adds another layer of risk to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would intervene before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to watch him teetering like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still oblivious, lost in her dishwashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, just be careful, little one.
segments.speaker: PAR
